channel.title: Extreme help needed!
channel.description:
Ok. i have 4 questions and i really need to know this things becouse those four questions are most important!
1. Where do i change start/ death spawn? if in config.java do i open in notepad++ or something else? 2.How can i make when the game start with New user and login option that it would say : welcome to aelscape instead of runescape? 3.How do i know what are coordinates of spawn point of some NPC if it is moving around? and how do i change them? 4.when i make tokens ( like in near reality) and put them in shop i get 2 problems: Tokens dont apper like noted but they full my inventory? and when i make like this 7775(token id) 75000000(amount) everything is ok. but when i add 5000000 and 5000000 (buy & sell) i get error????
thanks. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :) :) :) :) :)

item.title: Extreme help needed!
item.dc:creator: @Blazcobain Blazcobain
item.description:
@Blazcobain wrote:

No he is not admin or mod. just regular player. any other sugestions?

Read full topic

item.title: Extreme help needed!
item.dc:creator: @Cali_Tree Cali Tree
item.description:
@Cali_Tree wrote:

IS he a Admin+? you might have so admins don’t drop anything?

Read full topic

item.title: Extreme help needed!
item.dc:creator: @Blazcobain Blazcobain
item.description:
@Blazcobain wrote:

[quote=".cLass, post:2, topic:409916"]1. Yes, in config.java, open with notepad or notepad++ or eclipse etc.
2. Go to config.java and search for welcome_message, if you can’t find anything go to client.java & search for “Welcome to”
3. Go to spawn-config and find the NPC id. Look at how it works & understand it & then change it to whatever you want.[/quote]

everything worked i just figured out one more thing… i was testing and everything works its just when i kill my friend in wildy or monster kills him or he just dies he doesnt drop his items. he had full inventory and full armour and he kept everything. Normaly you keep 3 items + 1 protection or if skulled just 1

thanks for help

Read full topic

item.title: Extreme help needed!
item.dc:creator: @cLass1 .cLass
item.description:
@cLass1 wrote:

  1. Yes, in config.java, open with notepad or notepad++ or eclipse etc.
  2. Go to config.java and search for welcome_message, if you can’t find anything go to client.java & search for “Welcome to”
  3. Go to spawn-config and find the NPC id. Look at how it works & understand it & then change it to whatever you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Extreme help needed!
item.dc:creator: @Blazcobain Blazcobain
item.description:
@Blazcobain wrote:

Ok. i have 4 questions and i really need to know this things becouse those four questions are most important!

  1. Where do i change start/ death spawn? if in config.java do i open in notepad++ or something else?
    2.How can i make when the game start with New user and login option that it would say : welcome to aelscape instead of runescape?
    3.How do i know what are coordinates of spawn point of some NPC if it is moving around? and how do i change them?
    4.when i make tokens ( like in near reality) and put them in shop i get 2 problems:
    Tokens dont apper like noted but they full my inventory?
    and when i make like this 7775(token id) 75000000(amount) everything is ok. but when i add 5000000 and 5000000 (buy & sell) i get error???

thanks. !!!
